input_email_body:
Subject: Campaign Metrics Discrepancy Problem

I am encountering a mismatch in my campaign metrics. The analytics data is not accurate, despite my verification of the data sources You can reach me at johndoe@email.com.. I believe there might be an error in the tracking codes My name is Jane Smith.. Could you please investigate this issue and provide a solution? Please inform me if you need any further details from me to address this problem.
